attributes.action: Review the recent court case which gave banks and building society the right to reposses homes without a court order
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to

rejection.details: http://petitions.number10.gov.uk/Foreclosure/ Individual legal cases are a matter for direct communication with the Home Office.
reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
